Install plasma-widget-networkmanagement from https://edge.launchpad.net/~jr/+archive/ppa and run '''knetworkmanager'''

Keep failed tests please at the top of each result table. In general keep success and fails grouped together (the former at the bottom and the latter at the top of each table).

# Icon should form cycle
# Icon should show "plugged-in"
# Click Widget and check shown data
# Unplug ethernet cable
# Icon should show "unplugged"
